title: SAP BAPI: Create SAP GoodsMovement using BAPI_GOODSMVT_CREATE
description: Create a goods movement in SAP using the BAPI_GOODSMVT_CREATE function module. The input is assumed to be a RFC XML document provided by a HTTP POST to the logic app. This template executes a RFC Call BAPI_GOODSMVT_CREATE on the SAP system. An example xml document can be found at [Sample XML](https://github.com/Azure/LogicAppTemplates/post-sap-goodsmovement-using-bapi/sampleXML.xml) together with a [http test file](https://github.com/Azure/LogicAppTemplates/post-sap-goodsmovement-using-bapi/httpTestFile.http)
